input.title: Input Options
input.description: Parameters for finding and handling input data for NanopoReaTA.

seq_data_folder.title: Sequencing Data Folder
seq_data_folder.help_text: This accepts one of three cases: (i) the path to a single FASTQ file; (ii) the path to a top-level directory containing FASTQ files; (iii) the path to a directory containing one level of sub-directories which in turn contain FASTQ files. In the first and second case, a sample name can be supplied with `--sample`. In the last case, the data is assumed to be multiplexed with the names of the sub-directories as barcodes. In this case, a sample sheet can be provided with `--sample_sheet`.

output_dir.description: File path where results are written
output_dir.help_text: This accepts one of three cases: (i) the path to a single BAM file; (ii) the path to a top-level directory containing BAM files; (iii) the path to a directory containing one level of sub-directories which in turn contain BAM files. In the first and second case, a sample name can be supplied with `--sample`. In the last case, the data is assumed to be multiplexed with the names of the sub-directories as barcodes. In this case, a sample sheet can be provided with `--sample_sheet`.

metadata.title: Metadata Sheet
metadata.description: Path to CSV file with 'Sample, Condition, Replicate' as columns
metadata.help_text: The sample sheet is a CSV file with, minimally, columns named `barcode` and `alias`. Extra columns are allowed.

barcoded.description: Enable to continuously watch the input directory for new input files.
barcoded.help_text: This option enables the use of Nextflow’s directory watching feature to constantly monitor input directories for new files.

references.title: Reference Options
references.description: Parameters that relate to the reference genome and the species.

genome_gtf.description: GTF file containing the annotation for the species.

bed_file.description: BED file containing the annotation for the species (RseqQC Standard).

genome_fasta.description: FASTA file describing the whole genome.

advanced_options.title: Advanced Options
advanced_options.description: Advanced options for configuring processes inside the workflow.
advanced_options.help_text: These advanced options do not need to be changed for typical use, but allow fine tuning of workflows for users who want more control over the workflow.

batchsize.description: How many files would you like to process per iteration?

threads.description: How many thread you want to use?

script_dir.description: Path to the directory nextflow needs to get files from, here it could be the repository

disable_ping.description: Enable to prevent sending a workflow ping.
